mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_STAMP TS WHERE TS.FG_DEL = 'N' AND TS.FG_USE = 'Y' AND TS.DT_APPLY_START <= SYSDATE AND TS.DT_APPLY_END >= SYSDATE

SELECT TS.NO_STAMP , TSES.ID_STORE , TSES.NM_STORE FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_STAMP TS INNER JOIN CRMADMIN.TBS_STAMP_EXCEPT_STORE TSES ON TSES.NO_STAMP = TS.NO_STAMP WHERE TS.FG_DEL = 'N' AND TS.FG_USE = 'Y' AND TS.TP_SET = #{TP_SET} AND TS.DT_APPLY_START <= SYSDATE AND TS.DT_APPLY_END >= SYSDATE AND TSES.ID_STORE = #{ID_STORE}

SELECT TM.ID_MEMBER /* 회원PK */ , MOD(TM.CNT_STAMP, 10) AS CNT_STAMP /* 스템프개수 */ , TMSR.NO_MEMBER_STAMP_RECORD /* 회원스템프이력 일련번호 */ , TMSR.ORDER_NO /* 주문번호 */ , TMSR.CD_INCREMENT /* 증가/차감코드 */ , TMSR.TP_INCREMENT /* 증가/차감구분 */ , TMSR.FG_EVENT /* 이벤트여부 */ , TMSR.CNT_STAMP_INCRE /* 증가/차감스탬프갯수 */ , TMSR.CNT_STAMP_STACK /* 누적스탬프갯수 */ , TMSR.YN_STMAP_LAST /* 최종스탬프여부 */ , TMSR.DT_REG /* 최초등록일시 */ , TMSR.ID_REG_USER /* 최초등록자 */ , TMSR.DT_UPT /* 최근수정일시 */ , TMSR.ID_UPT_USER /* 최근수정자 */ FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_MEMBER TM INNER JOIN CRMADMIN.TBS_MEMBER_STAMP_RECORD TMSR ON TM.ID_MEMBER = TMSR.ID_MEMBER AND TMSR.YN_STMAP_LAST = 'Y' WHERE TM.ID_MEMBER = #{ID_MEMBER}

SELECT TM.ID_MEMBER /* 회원PK */ , TM.DS_EMAIL /* 회원이메일 */ , TM.CNT_STAMP /* 스템프개수 */ , TMSR.NO_MEMBER_STAMP_RECORD /* 회원스템프이력 일련번호 */ , TMSR.ORDER_NO /* 주문번호 */ , TMSR.STOR_CD /* 주문매장 */ , TMSR.CD_INCREMENT /* 증가/차감코드 */ , TMSR.TP_INCREMENT /* 증가/차감구분 */ , TMSR.FG_EVENT /* 이벤트여부 */ , TMSR.CNT_STAMP_INCRE /* 증가/차감스탬프갯수 */ , TMSR.CNT_STAMP_STACK /* 누적스탬프갯수 */ , TMSR.YN_STMAP_LAST /* 최종스탬프여부 */ , TMSR.DT_REG /* 최초등록일시 */ , TMSR.ID_REG_USER /* 최초등록자 */ , TMSR.DT_UPT /* 최근수정일시 */ , TMSR.ID_UPT_USER /* 최근수정자 */ FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_MEMBER TM INNER JOIN CRMADMIN.TBS_MEMBER_STAMP_RECORD TMSR ON TM.ID_MEMBER = TMSR.ID_MEMBER WHERE TM.ID_MEMBER = #{ID_MEMBER} AND TMSR.ORDER_NO = #{ORDER_NO}

SELECT A.CODE AS TP_REWARD , NVL(B.CNT, 0) AS CNT FROM CRMADMIN.SYS_CODE A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT TP_REWARD, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_MEMBER_STAMP_REWARD WHERE ID_MEMBER = #{ID_MEMBER} AND FG_ISSUE='N' GROUP BY TP_REWARD ) B ON A.CODE = B.TP_REWARD WHERE CODE_CATEGORY_ID = 'TP_REWARD'

SELECT ID_MEMBER /* 회원PK */ , NO_MEMBER_STAMP_REWARD /* 회원스템프리워드일련번호 */ , ORDER_NO /* 주문번호 */ , TP_REWARD /* 리워드구분(5개,10개) */ , CD_COUPON /* 쿠폰코드 */ , DT_ACT_STAMP_EXCHANGE /* 스템프교환가능일자 */ , DT_STAMP_ISSUE /* 스템프발급일자 */ , FG_ISSUE /* 발급여부 */ , DT_REG /* 최초등록일시 */ , ID_REG_USER /* 최초등록자 */ , DT_UPT /* 최근수정일시 */ , ID_UPT_USER /* 최근수정자 */ FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_MEMBER_STAMP_REWARD WHERE ORDER_NO = #{ORDER_NO}

SELECT NO_MEMBER_STAMP_RECORD /* 회원스템프이력일련번호 */ , ORDER_NO /* 주문번호 */ , ID_MEMBER /* 회원PK */ , CD_INCREMENT /* 증/차감코드 */ , TP_INCREMENT /* 증/차감구분(스템프전환,상품구입 등) */ , FG_EVENT /* 이벤트여부 */ , CNT_STAMP_INCRE /* 증/차감스템프갯수 */ , CNT_STAMP_STACK /* 누적스템프갯수 */ , YN_STMAP_LAST /* 최종스템프여부 */ , STOR_CD /* 주문매장 */ , DT_REG /* 최초등록일시 */ FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_MEMBER_STAMP_RECORD A WHERE ID_MEMBER = #{ID_MEMBER} AND CD_INCREMENT = '01' AND DT_REG >= (SELECT DT_REG FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_MEMBER_STAMP_RECORD A WHERE ID_MEMBER = #{ID_MEMBER} AND ORDER_NO = #{ORDER_NO})

SELECT NVL(TCP.STATUS, 'N') AS FG_USE FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_MEMBER_STAMP_REWARD TMSR LEFT OUTER JOIN CRMADMIN.TBS_COUPON_PIN TCP ON TCP.NO_MEMBER_STAMP_REWARD = TMSR.NO_MEMBER_STAMP_REWARD AND TCP.CD_COUPON = TMSR.CD_COUPON AND TCP.ID_MEMBER = TMSR.ID_MEMBER AND TCP.STATUS <> 'C' AND TCP.DT_USE >= (SELECT DT_REG FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_MEMBER_STAMP_RECORD A WHERE ID_MEMBER = #{ID_MEMBER} AND ORDER_NO = #{ORDER_NO} AND CD_INCREMENT = '01') WHERE TMSR.ID_MEMBER = #{ID_MEMBER}

SELECT CRMADMIN.SEQ_TBS_MEMBER_STAMP_REWARD.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO CRMADMIN.TBS_MEMBER_STAMP_REWARD ( ID_MEMBER /* 회원PK */ , NO_MEMBER_STAMP_REWARD /* 회원스템프리워드일련번호 */ , ORDER_NO /* 주문번호 */ , TP_REWARD /* 리워드구분(5개,10개) */ , CD_COUPON /* 쿠폰코드 */ , DT_ACT_STAMP_EXCHANGE /* 스템프교환가능일자 */ , DT_STAMP_ISSUE /* 스템프발급일자 */ , FG_ISSUE /* 발급여부 */ , DT_REG /* 최초등록일시 */ , ID_REG_USER /* 최초등록자 */ , DT_UPT /* 최근수정일시 */ , ID_UPT_USER /* 최근수정자 */ ) VALUES ( #{ID_MEMBER} , #{SEQ_TBS_MEMBER_STAMP_REWARD} , #{ORDER_NO} , #{TP_REWARD} , NULL , SYSDATE + 1 , NULL , 'N' , SYSDATE , #{ID_MEMBER} , SYSDATE , #{ID_MEMBER} )
